BatchBuilder - Class in <Unnamed>
Implements the Builder design pattern for step-by-step construction of a BatchExecutor instance.

BatchConsole - Class in <Unnamed>
This class creates a console interface utility designed to read arguments from the command-line.
BatchConsole(BatchImageEngine.Builder) - Constructor for class BatchConsole
Constructs a new instance of this class, employing a Builder design pattern to process the specified parameters and update the copied image files.
BatchConsole.BatchImageBuilder - Class in <Unnamed>
Following the Builder design pattern, this inner class extends from the inner abstract class Builder of the abstract outer class BatchImageEngine.
BatchErrorException - Exception in <Unnamed>
This exception is thrown when the running application is terminated abruptly.

BatchExecutor - Class in <Unnamed>
Automates the batch processing of image files by copying, renaming, and chronologically sorting them based on their EXIF metadata, such as DateTimeOriginal.
BatchExecutor(BatchBuilder) - Constructor for class BatchExecutor
Constructs a BatchExecutor using the specified BatchBuilder configuration.
BatchExecutor.NavigateDirectory - Class in <Unnamed>
An inner class extending SimpleFileVisitor navigates the source directory and extracts metadata from image files on the fly.
BatchImageBuilder() - Constructor for class BatchConsole.BatchImageBuilder
 
BatchImageEngine - Class in <Unnamed>
Automates the batch processing of image files by copying the original files to a target directory, renaming them with a specified prefix, sorting them based on their original Date Taken attribute, and updating the creation date, last modification time, and last access time to match with the original Date Taken attribute, found in the image metadata.
BatchImageEngine(BatchImageEngine.Builder) - Constructor for class BatchImageEngine
Constructs a BatchImageEngine instance using data from command line arguments, encapsulated in a Builder object.
BatchImageEngine.Builder - Class in <Unnamed>
This inner class implements a builder design pattern to construct an object in a step-by-step fashion, providing a clean and efficient approach for instantiation.
BatchImageEngine.NavigateDirectory - Class in <Unnamed>
An inner class extending SimpleFileVisitor navigates the source directory and extracts metadata from image files on the fly.
